title: Establish and interface in webui linking into external services
body:
I had dumped some ideas for a few immediate use cases in case of DANDI at https://github.com/dandi/dandiarchive/wiki/WiP:-dump-of-thoughts-on-%22services-registry%22 .

For some it might be necessary to adjust CORR settings of the web server hosting our web ui.  I think registry should include that information and then any particular website deployment should have somewhere (top level .git/config?) settings to which services to enable.  But with that enabled we already have support for redirecting for any file we host to bioimagesuiteweb ([visit example](https://bioimagesuiteweb.github.io/webapp/overlayviewer.html?image=https://datasets.datalad.org/labs/haxby/raiders/derivatives/openfmrilayout-qa-defacing/defacing/alldefaced.nii.gz&overlay=https://datasets.datalad.org/labs/haxby/raiders/derivatives/openfmrilayout-qa-defacing/defacing/alldefaced_mean.nii.gz)).

So if we establish such registry, then any e.g. .nii.gz file could have a context menu pop up with "Single View on bisweb".

If web interface could support selection of multiple files, or adding them into some kind of a "queue", we could add action for multiple like "Overlay View on bisweb", etc.
